### Hello,
I am a Lecturer in the [Educational Psychology](https://www.cehd.umn.edu/edpsych/) department at the [University of Minnesota](https://twin-cities.umn.edu/), and the Managing Director and Affiliate Faculty of the [Learning Informatics Lab](https://innovation.umn.edu/informatics/).

I'm an interdisciplinary cognitive scientist interested in how people learn and think about math, data, and programming. I love to teach cognition, statistics, computing, and research methods. I'm also passionate about open, inclusive science and making science communication more transparent, effective, and human.


::: {.activities}

::: {.interests-col-6}
## Interests

* Math Learning
* Mathematical Cognition
* Causal Learning
* Programming Instruction
* Statistical Thinking
* Open Science
* Science Communication

:::
